tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE call_records (
    call_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    caller_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    call_duration INT,
    call_date TIMESTAMP,
    call_location VARCHAR(255),
    network_traffic_data JSON
)

CREATE TABLE CallRecords (
	call_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	caller_number VARCHAR(10),
	recipient_number VARCHAR(10),
	call_duration INT,
	call_datetime TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE CallRecords (
    call_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    caller_number VARCHAR(50),
    receiver_number VARCHAR(50),
    call_duration INT,
    call_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    call_datetime TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE NetworkTraffic (
    traffic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_ip VARCHAR(50),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(50),
    data_volume INT,
    protocol VARCHAR(10),
    traffic_datetime TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE CallRecords (
  call_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  caller_number VARCHAR(10),
  receiver_number VARCHAR(10),
  call_duration INT,
  call_datetime TIMESTAMP,
  call_type VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE NetworkTrafficData (
  record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  source_ip VARCHAR(15),
  destination_ip VARCHAR(15),
  data_size INT,
  traffic_datetime TIMESTAMP,
  protocol VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE FraudulentActivities (
  activity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_type VARCHAR(50),
  activity_datetime TIMESTAMP,
  detection_method VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE FraudulentUsers (
  user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_name VARCHAR(50),
  user_phone VARCHAR(10),
  user_email VARCHAR(50),
  detection_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE CallRecords (
    call_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    caller_number VARCHAR(255),
    callee_number VARCHAR(255),
    call_duration INT,
    call_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE NetworkTrafficData (
    traffic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_ip VARCHAR(255),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
    data_amount INT,
    traffic_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE FraudulentCalls (
    call_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    caller_number VARCHAR(255),
    callee_number VARCHAR(255),
    call_duration INT,
    call_date TIMESTAMP,
    fraud_detection_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE FraudulentTraffic (
    traffic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_ip VARCHAR(255),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
    data_amount INT,
    traffic_date TIMESTAMP,
    fraud_detection_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE FraudDetectionLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    action_taken VARCHAR(255),
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
